caption:
Table 4: Comparison between OOD detection w.o. labels using the representa-
tions obtained by different stages of the SCAN clustering method (CIFAR-10 vs. 
CIFAR-100) ROCAUC (%). The results show that the naive approach of directly 
using SCAN with pre-trained features falls behind our two-stage approach.
